original_text: Joshua and his army also saw the smoke. They knew that the other group of soldiers had taken the city. So they turned round and began to attack the men of Ai.
korean_text: 여호수아와 온 이스라엘이 그 복병이 성읍을 점령함과 성읍에 연기가 오름을 보고 다시 돌이켜 아이 사람들을 쳐죽이고

sentences.original_text: Joshua and his army also saw the smoke
They knew that the other group of soldiers had taken the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 부대의 군인들이 성을 점령했다는 것을 알았다

sentences.original_text: and began to attack the men of Ai
